response.overview: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.
response.tagline: Could you kill your best friend?
response.title: Battle Royale

titles.title: Battle Royale - Nur einer kann überleben!
バトル・ロワイアル 特別篇

cast.name: Ai Iwamura
cast.character: A Girl Who Won Last Battle Royale
